title: Update GDD/Wiki for github
description: Since Im using AI for help me this early start all AI lacks on history memory so its good to always make the GDD updated.

title: Add 5 new features
description:
Some new features for QOL (Quality Of Life) for the app until I cant start from 0.

* import/export data - so if you have any bugs you can delete the app and reinstall without lose any data.
* add reminder & notification
* add repeat task, daily/weel/month

title: Fix bug when minize app
description: Fix bug when minize app with modal for edit a task is open.
